links: Vincenzo Librandi, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..200
formula: G.f.: (1-sqrt(1-12*x+32*x^2))/2 - _Michael Somos_, Jun 08 2000.n*a(n) = (12*n-18)*a(n-1) - 32*(n-3)*a(n-2) - _Richard Choulet_, Dec 17 2009a(n) ~ 2^(3*n-5/2)/(sqrt(Pi)*n^(3/2)). - _Vaclav Kotesovec_, Oct 11 2013a(n) = 4^(n-2)*hypergeom([3/2, -n+2], [3], -1) for n>1. - _Peter Luschny_, Feb 03 2015a(n+1) = GegenbauerC(n-1, -n, -3)/n for n>=1. - _Peter Luschny_, May 09 2016
maple: h := n -> simplify(4^n*hypergeom([3/2, -n], [3], -1)):a := n -> `if`(n=1, 3, h(n-2)):seq(a(n), n=1..21); # _Peter Luschny_, Feb 03 2015
prog: (PARI) a(n)=polcoeff((1-sqrt(1-12*x+32*x^2+x*O(x^n)))/2,n)(PARI) {a(n)=if(n<2, 3*(n==1), n--; polcoeff( serreverse( x/(1+6*x+x^2) +x*O(x^n) ), n))} /* _Michael Somos_, Oct 14 2006 */
author: _Clark Kimberling_
